input.prompt:
Review this code for Phase 5: Complete and Delete Task Functionality GOAL: Implement checkbox toggling for completion and delete button for removal ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: - Clicking checkbox toggles task between complete and incomplete - Completed tasks show visual styling: #666666 text, line-through, opacity 0.7 - Clicking checkbox again un-completes the task (removes styling) - Clicking delete button removes the task from the list immediately - No confirmation dialog appears for delete - Completed tasks remain visible in the list (not hidden or filtered) - Empty state appears if all tasks are deleted CODE TO REVIEW: ```index.html Todo App

Todo App

output.response:
## Criteria Check:
- [Clicking checkbox toggles task between complete and incomplete]: PASS - The checkbox correctly toggles the `completed` status of tasks.
- [Completed tasks show visual styling: #666666 text, line-through, opacity 0.7]: PASS - Completed tasks are styled as specified.
- [Clicking checkbox again un-completes the task (removes styling)]: PASS - Toggling the checkbox a second time correctly removes the completed status and styles.
- [Clicking delete button removes the task from the list immediately]: PASS - The delete button correctly removes tasks from the list without any delay or confirmation dialog.
- [No confirmation dialog appears for delete]: PASS - There is no confirmation dialog when deleting a task.
- [Completed tasks remain visible in the list (not hidden or filtered)]: PASS - Completed tasks are not hidden and remain visible in the list.
- [Empty state appears if all tasks are deleted]: PASS - The empty state message correctly appears when all tasks are deleted.

## Score: 100

## Feedback for Developer:
ALL CRITERIA PASSED - APPROVED
